mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments ( order_id, user_id, plan_code, order_name, customer_name, original_amount, used_point, amount, status, requested_at ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{planCode}, #{orderName}, #{customerName}, #{originalAmount}, #{usedPoint}, #{amount}, #{status}, #{requestedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.order_id, p.user_id, p.plan_code, p.payment_key, p.order_name, p.customer_name, p.original_amount, p.used_point, p.amount, p.status, p.requested_at, p.canceled_at, p.pay_method, p.pg_raw_response, p.card_company, p.card_approval_no, p.approved_at, s.status AS subscription_status, s.start_date AS subscription_start_at, s.end_date AS subscription_end_at FROM payments p LEFT JOIN subscriptions s ON s.order_id = p.order_id WHERE p.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT p.order_id, p.user_id, p.plan_code, p.payment_key, p.order_name, p.customer_name, p.original_amount, p.used_point, p.amount, p.status, p.requested_at, p.canceled_at, p.pay_method, p.pg_raw_response, p.card_company, p.card_approval_no, p.approved_at, s.status AS subscription_status, s.start_date AS subscription_start_at, s.end_date AS subscription_end_at FROM payments p LEFT JOIN subscriptions s ON s.order_id = p.order_id WHERE p.payment_key = #{paymentKey} AND p.status = 'DONE'
mapper.update: UPDATE payments SET payment_key = #{paymentKey}, status = #{status}, pay_method = #{payMethod}, pg_raw_response = #{pgRawResponse}, card_company = #{cardCompany}, card_approval_no = #{cardApprovalNo}, approved_at = #{approvedAt} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
UPDATE payments SET status = #{status}, canceled_at = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

UPDATE payments SET user_id = #{userId}, plan_code = #{planCode}, order_name = #{orderName}, customer_name = #{customerName}, original_amount = #{originalAmount}, used_point = #{usedPoint}, amount = #{amount}, status = #{status}, requested_at = #{requestedAt} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.order_id, p.user_id, p.plan_code, p.payment_key, p.order_name, p.customer_name, p.original_amount, p.used_point, p.amount, p.status, p.requested_at, p.canceled_at, p.pay_method, p.pg_raw_response, p.card_company, p.card_approval_no, p.approved_at, s.status AS subscription_status, s.start_date AS subscription_start_at, s.end_date AS subscription_end_at FROM payments p LEFT JOIN subscriptions s ON s.order_id = p.order_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.requested_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
